item.name: Corpse Slayer Brass Knuckles
item.text:
Unarmed: When you make an unarmed attack you can choose to deal the damage of this weapon instead of your normal unarmed attack damage.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit an undead creature with an attack using this weapon, the attack deals an extra 1d8 damage of the weapon's type, and the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead until the start of your next turn.
Proficiency: simple, knuckles Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 266, Player's Handbook (2014) p. 149

item.name: Brass Knuckles of Certain Death
item.text:
Unarmed: When you make an unarmed attack you can choose to deal the damage of this weapon instead of your normal unarmed attack damage.
When you damage a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.
Proficiency: simple, knuckles Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 270, Player's Handbook (2014) p. 149
